attributes.action: Invoke article 50 to leave the EU only after expert review and majority MP vote
attributes.additional_details: This petition is brought in the best interests of our Nation, our economy and to safeguard the livelihoods of the British People irrespective of their voting preference, and ensure that any such EU exit is clearly advantageous to the majority of the British people. Now the British people have voted it is the responsibility of Government to carry out due diligence in to the full implications of this Referendum result.
attributes.background: Despite a small leave majority, we petition HM Government that any invoking of article 50 to start EU exit is ONLY done after a majority vote of MP’s having fully considered EXPERT evidence exploring every aspect and impact of an EU exit decision, including proposed post exit plans.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
